org.genepattern.matrix
Interface Dataset

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDataset, DefaultDataset, ModifiableDatasetWrapper, SlicedDatasetView
public interface Dataset

The interface for a dataset consisting of a two-dimensional matrix of double values. A dataset may also optionally contain one or more series of two-dimensional matrices of objects. A dataset may also optionally have metadata associated with each row and/or column.
